translation.en: It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
translation.fr: Il fait 24 degrés à San Diego

translation.en: and the number one song of the day is still Blush by Koop.
translation.fr: et le tube du jour est toujours Blush de Koop.

translation.en: ♪ I feel your eyes on me ♪
translation.fr: Je sens ton regard sur moi

translation.en: ♪ You should know better… ♪
Whoo!
♪ You put on the pressure ♪
♪ Something tells me I, I should not let go… ♪
translation.fr: Quelque chose me dit Que je devrais pas lâcher l'affaire

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
translation.fr: Quelque chose fait que je doute… C'est mon anniv' !

translation.en: ♪ I've been working hard… ♪
translation.fr: J'ai tout fait pour que tu voies

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.fr: J'ai tout fait pour que tu voies L'effet que tu me fais…

translation.en: It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
translation.fr: Choré improvisée avec ma meilleure amie d'enfance !

translation.en: - Because it's your birthday! -
Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
translation.fr: J'adore, mais je meurs de faim.

translation.en: Okay, I need your help.
Question. What do you think? Quarter- life chic? Or quarter- life crisis?
translation.fr: Donne-moi ton avis. 25 ans chic ? Ou 25 ans en crise ?

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
translation.fr: Tu es assortie à la lampe, donc…

translation.en: - Would a hat help? - No.
Rude!
- Here. - Thank you.
Okay, for my Cassie- palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.fr: Pour lancer la Palooza de Cassie, on va commencer en boîte,

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.fr: où on va décorer la zone VIP tout l'après-midi.

translation.en: - Hey, I have this crazy idea. - I'm listening.
translation.fr: J'ai une idée folle. - Dis-moi. - Au lieu de sortir…

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.fr: - Dis-moi. - Au lieu de sortir… On pourrait rester ici.

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.fr: On se met en jogging, on fait un puzzle comme avant et on recommande des nouilles.

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
translation.fr: on fait un puzzle comme avant et on recommande des nouilles.

translation.en: No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.fr: Non, on sort. Je vais avoir 25 ans. Je dois marquer le coup !

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
translation.fr: Je vais avoir 25 ans. Je dois marquer le coup !

translation.en: You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.fr: Comme depuis quatre ans ! Tu peux survivre à une soirée calme.

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.fr: En plus, on a délaissé le puzzle. Regarde Mona sans son sourire.

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.fr: Regarde Mona sans son sourire. C'est déprimant.

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.fr: Non, j'y vais. C'est la tradition et mes amis seront là.

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
I was just added as one of the junior research assistants on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
translation.fr: J'ai été nommée assistante de recherche sur les fossiles de marsupiaux.

translation.en: I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations!
translation.fr: J'ai pas tout compris, mais félicitations !

translation.en: I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.fr: On est trois assistantes, c'est pas si…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
translation.fr: C'est important. Tu devrais fêter ça.

translation.en: Because guess what? Tonight is…  …a celebration!
translation.fr: Parce que tu sais quoi ? Ce soir, on fait la fête !

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise.
translation.fr: Toi aussi. On va s'amuser, promis.

translation.en: We leave in an hour- ish.
Love you, my bestie since we were six!
Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way? Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.fr: - Je t'ai dit que tu étais craquante ? - Oui, environ 19 fois.

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
translation.fr: Je le pensais à chaque fois. Tu es canon.

translation.en: - I love this dress on you. - Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
translation.fr: Merci, Cassie. Qui sera là ce soir ?

translation.en: Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
Moving in?
Oh, hi.
Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que tu emménages. C'était une question idiote.

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.fr: Moi c'est Cassie et ma brillante colocataire…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
translation.fr: j'ai pas l'habitude de parler aux gens.

translation.en: - Right. - Works in the Museum of Natural History.
translation.fr: - Je vois. - Au Musée d'histoire naturelle.

translation.en: Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.fr: Je compose la musique de jeux vidéo,

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
translation.fr: donc moi aussi, j'ai peu d'interaction humaine.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.fr: Je vous serrerais bien la main, mais je ferais tomber ça

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
translation.fr: et j'ai besoin de cette vaisselle.

translation.en: - Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. - Brilliant. Cool.
translation.fr: - Tiens. Je t'ouvre la porte. - Super. Cool.

translation.en: Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.fr: On doit y aller. Mais bienvenue, Max.

translation.en: - Yeah, thanks. See ya. - Yeah. Yeah.
- Oh, don't give me that look. - What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.fr: - Ne me regarde pas comme ça. - De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: - You wanna play matchmaker? - I didn't say that.
Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
- There was a spark? - Mm!
No, there was no spark.
I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.fr: J'ai du travail, je peux pas me laisser distraire.

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.fr: Pas même par ce voisin et son petit accent ?

translation.en: I'm not like you.
I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.fr: Toi, tu sais jongler avec une vie sociale.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
translation.fr: Car je suis organisatrice de soirées.

translation.en: Well, I'm on a path here.
Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.fr: j'assure à ce poste pour aller faire des fouilles avec ma paléontologue préférée.

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
translation.fr: pour aller faire des fouilles avec ma paléontologue préférée.

translation.en: Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun.
translation.fr: Je dois te présenter mon ami Fun.

translation.en: I don't know if you two have ever met.
Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
translation.fr: Je dois d'abord digérer tout ça.

translation.en: Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.fr: Mon père est déchaîné. - Il publie une posture par jour. - J'aime son corbeau.

translation.en: - I liked his flying crow. - Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.fr: - Il publie une posture par jour. - J'aime son corbeau. - Ne l'encourage pas. - Je suis pas la seule.

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.fr: - Ne l'encourage pas. - Je suis pas la seule. Regarde tous les likes pour son studio de yoga.

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.fr: Je sais. Tout le monde me vante ses cours incroyables.

translation.en: We should take one.
No, I'm good. I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.fr: J'ai fait assez de yoga indirectement, je suis conditionnée à vie.

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media. It's like he's trying to connect with you.
translation.fr: C'est chou qu'il soit sur les réseaux. Il essaie de se rapprocher de toi.

translation.en: Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.fr: Je l'aime, mais c'est mon père, pas mon pote.

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
translation.fr: Si tu laissais un commentaire, il serait aux anges.

translation.en: Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment.
translation.fr: Bon, d'accord ! Je like, mais aucun commentaire.

translation.en: - You happy? - Mm- hmm.
So this is, like, our 19th Cassie- palooza kickoff.
It's gonna be the best ever!
Hey, Bob.
Good evening, Cassie.
- Thank you. - Ladies, welcome.
She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.fr: C'est ma personne préférée. Je l'adore.

translation.en: Cassie's here!
- Wow. This is actually really pretty. - Hi!
- Happy birthday, Cassie! - Whoo!
Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.fr: Bon anniversaire ! C'est bon de te voir.

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
You are the best!
Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
- - It's our song. - It's Koop! - Yeah.
- We have to dance! - Okay.
Come on! Come on!
Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
translation.fr: Allez ! Montre-moi ce que tu sais faire.

translation.en: Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
I'm flying!
Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
- Drink! Drink! - Here! It's your birthday!
Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
- More! More! More! More! - Oh yeah!
- So much fun! You! - You kept drinking shots.
translation.fr: C'était trop cool ! T'as enchaîné les shots.

translation.en: Because you kept handing them to me!
translation.fr: C'est toi qui me les donnais !

translation.en: You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
translation.fr: T'es folle ! Je peux pas te suivre.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
translation.fr: Le prochain arrêt, c'est chez Roddy.

translation.en: I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.fr: J'ai loué un toboggan qui va du toit à sa piscine !

translation.en: What's wrong?
You're bailing, aren't you?
I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.fr: Personne ne le verrait si on rentrait maintenant.

translation.en: I would notice!
You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.fr: Tu sais que ces gens sont horribles ?

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.fr: Ils essaient juste de s'amuser, ce que tu devrais faire !

translation.en: - Come on. - I like having a good time too.
Only I wanna do it with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.fr: Mais avec des amis qui se soucient de moi

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.fr: et m'apprécient même si je ne loue pas un toboggan hyper dangereux.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.fr: Pas de gens qui se cachent derrière un filtre.

translation.en: I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
- Come on, Cassie, let's go! - Okay, one second!
translation.fr: - Allez, Cassie, on y va ! - Une seconde !

translation.en: You know, you're different when you're with them.  I'm what?
translation.fr: - T'es différente quand t'es avec eux. - Comment ça ?

translation.en: It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.fr: Tu crois que tu vaux rien si on te remarque pas.

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.fr: Moi, j'ai une vie sociale. Je me cache pas derrière mon bureau.

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.fr: La vie ne se limite pas à faire la fête

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.fr: ou à connaître le nom des barmen.

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.fr: C'est ça, ma vie sociale ne vaut rien.

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends doesn't mean I don't work hard.
translation.fr: Je suis pas scientifique mais je travaille dur.

translation.en: - I didn't say that! - But you meant it!
I see how you only pretend to be interested when I tell you about some event I planned
translation.fr: Tu fais semblant de t'intéresser quand je parle de mes soirées

translation.en: or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.fr: ou tu insinues toujours que je suis jamais là.

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.fr: Et toi, tu fais pas semblant aussi ?

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
You work at the museum.
But what do I do there?
I don't know. I don't understand that stuff. And I don't understand your stuff.
translation.fr: - Je sais pas. J'y comprends rien ! - Pareil pour moi.

translation.en: Classic.
We never hang out anymore.
Just the two of us.
We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.fr: On est débordées. On doit juste trouver du temps pour nous.

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. L'amitié, ça devrait pas demander tant d'effort.

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
translation.fr: Je le ressens pas comme ça, Lisa.

translation.en: But I can tell from your face that you do.
translation.fr: Mais on dirait que toi, oui.

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.fr: On va pas rester meilleures amies par habitude.

translation.en: I'm a habit?
Th-- That's it? You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.fr: Tu dis un truc pareil et tu t'en vas ?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.fr: Il faut peut-être admettre qu'on devrait passer à autre chose.

translation.en: - Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -
translation.fr: Qui est prêt à aller chez Roddy ?

translation.en: Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
Mona's missing her smile.
Here's one.
Put this here.
That'll fix it.
So stupid.
So stupid.
Uh, hi.
Excuse me?
Did that go viral?
Oh, you're awake!
Welcome. Welcome.
No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.fr: Non, ne t'inquiète pas. C'est pour la recherche.

translation.en: I'm Val. I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.fr: Val, je serai ta gardienne pendant cette transition.

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
translation.fr: Ravie de te rencontrer enfin, Cassandra Adeline Garcia.

translation.en: Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.fr: D'après mes notes, tu te fais appeler Cassie, tu as 25 ans…

translation.en: - In a few days. - Huh?
Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
Born May 31st, died May 25th.
translation.fr: Née le 31 mai, décédée le 25 mai.

translation.en: Died?
Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
Who… who are you?
I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.fr: Je suis Val. Votre ange gardienne temporaire.

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
translation.fr: On dirait pas. Vous n'avez pas de halo ?

translation.en: - Oh, special occasions only. - Okay, what about wings?
translation.fr: - Pour les grandes occasions. - Et des ailes ?

translation.en: Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
translation.fr: Non, on les a supprimées il y a des années.

translation.en: Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
I was… I was just with my friends.
Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.fr: Je sais ! J'ai bu du champagne rempli de paillettes d'or.

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate.  I'm hallucinating.
translation.fr: Parfois, ça fait halluciner. J'ai une hallucination.

translation.en: No. This isn't a hallucination.
translation.fr: Non, ce n'est pas une hallucination.

translation.en: Oh, this… this part's always hard.
How can I put this?
Yeah, um, you died.
- Stop saying that! - I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
- I died in the bathroom? - Yeah.
Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
Look, it's going to be okay.
And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.fr: Et le pire est passé, maintenant que tu es m…

translation.en: No longer living.
You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à endurer tous ces tracas humains,

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
translation.fr: comme le chagrin ou le syndrome prémenstruel.

translation.en: Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.fr: Vois la vie après la mort comme une longue journée au spa.

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
translation.fr: Si tu es chanceuse, ça pourrait durer à jamais.

translation.en: So, I went up?
- Well-- - Is this down? I went down?
translation.fr: - Eh bien… - Je suis en enfer ?

translation.en: You're in the middle. We call this the In- Between.
translation.fr: Tu es au milieu. On l'appelle le Monde Intermédiaire.

translation.en: So like general admission?
Sure. This is your personal waiting room. It's your safe space.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est ta salle d'attente personnelle. C'est ton petit cocon.

translation.en: It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.fr: Il est conçu selon tes goûts

translation.en: to make your transition more…  …comfortable.
translation.fr: pour rendre ta transition plus agréable.

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In- Between?
translation.fr: Tous ceux qui meurent vont dans le Monde Intermédiaire ?

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
translation.fr: Oh non. - Je devrais te donner un dépliant. - Non, dites-moi !

translation.en: No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.fr: - Je devrais te donner un dépliant. - Non, dites-moi !

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
Well, the In- Between is for those who have unfinished business
translation.fr: Le Monde Intermédiaire est pour ceux qui ont encore des choses à régler sur terre,

translation.en: back on Earth,
translation.fr: qui ont encore des choses à régler sur terre,

translation.en: like yourself.
What unfinished business?
Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.fr: On te donne une chance d'arranger les choses

translation.en: with a select list of people,
you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.fr: Si tu réussis, tu accèdes au paradis.

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know…
But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.fr: C'est pas réservé aux meurtriers et aux détracteurs de Beyoncé ?

translation.en: - I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. - Yeah.
No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
translation.fr: Non, c'est un système à plusieurs niveaux.

translation.en: You want the Above. Trust me.
You ready to meet your list?
Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.fr: C'était comme un grand huit les yeux bandés.

translation.en: You get used to it.
Wait, we're at my dad's house.
Hey, Dad!
Why isn't he responding?
He can't see or hear you.
translation.fr: Il ne peut ni te voir ni t'entendre.

translation.en: No one can.
What? No, that can't be right.
Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas effrayer les gens sur terre.

translation.en: They're so fragile.
Hello? Dad?
It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.fr: C'est moi, Cassie. Ta fille unique préférée.

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
What is goin' on?
And why is this house such a mess?
translation.fr: Et pourquoi la maison est dans cet état ?

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.fr: Et pourquoi la maison est dans cet état ? Ça lui ressemble pas.

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.fr: Il enseigne le yoga. Il a une vie saine.

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
How long have I been gone?
Val, how long?
- A year. - A year? It feels like a day.
translation.fr: - Un an. - Un an ? J'aurais cru un jour.

translation.en: Well, time works differently up there.
Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.fr: Il était comme ça au départ de ma mère.

translation.en: After you passed,
he gave up.
When was the last time you saw him?
I… I don't know. I…
I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.fr: Je voulais venir, mais j'avais plein d'événements.

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
translation.fr: J'ai liké une publication. Ça compte ?

translation.en: Is that why he's on my list?
He's in mourning.
He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
translation.fr: Il lui faut une raison pour reprendre espoir.

translation.en: Tell me what I should do.
You should see the rest of your list.
translation.fr: Découvre le reste de ta liste.

translation.en: Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.fr: Lisa ? Vraiment, Val ? Je mets mon veto catégorique.

translation.en: There is no hard pass. There isn't even a regular pass.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de veto catégorique. Pas même de simple veto.

translation.en: What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.fr: Et si je me débarrasse d'elle ? Non, pas dans ce sens.

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
translation.fr: On omet Lisa de la liste.

translation.en: Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu redoutes de revoir ton amie ?

translation.en: - My former BFF, and I'm not. - Mm.
There's too much history between us.
translation.fr: Il s'est passé trop de choses.

translation.en: Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.fr: Et puis, j'ai pas envie. L'amitié dure pas toujours.

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list? This is my afterlife we're talking about.
translation.fr: Je peux pas décider de ma liste ? Il s'agit de ma vie.

translation.en: She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.fr: Elle se mure dans le travail depuis ta mort.

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
translation.fr: Tous les jours, elle est la dernière à partir.

translation.en: How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.fr: Et si on sautait Lisa pour passer au nom suivant ?

translation.en: - I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. - No. I don't do that.
translation.fr: - Je l'accepterai sans me plaindre. Juré. - Je ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
translation.fr: Mais allons voir qui vient après.

translation.en: Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
How are you doing that?
Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.fr: Tu peux, toi aussi. Chaque ange est doté de ce pouvoir.

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.fr: Concentre-toi sur le lieu, claque des doigts ou hoche la tête.

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
Just make it your own. And then you're there.
So, I can go anywhere?
translation.fr: Donc, je peux aller n'importe où ?

translation.en: Oh, no, not anywhere.
Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.fr: Ta téléportation est limitée aux endroits requis.

translation.en: No detours.
- Got it. - Right. Now, back to the list.
translation.fr: - Compris. - Bien. Revenons à la liste.

translation.en: - Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. - Morgan, slow down!
translation.fr: Je suis pas prête. Morgan, ralentis !

translation.en: - Wait for Mommy! -
Hi, you're so fast.  Oh.
- That's-- - Your mother.
I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
- She's Sofia to me. -
Is that my half sister?
I've never met her.
So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
translation.fr: On dirait bien que tu as des choses à régler.

translation.en: Can we go now, please?

actually, I, um…

- It's so sparkly. -

this is your life now.

B- R- I- T- T- O.

In the bag, Britto.

translation.fr: Je dois t'avouer. Tu m'as plu dès notre rencontre.

translation.en: And I may regret saying this out loud, but…
translation.fr: Et je vais peut-être regretter d'avoir dit ça, mais…

translation.en: I still have this overwhelming desire to kiss you.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours très envie de t'embrasser.

translation.en: I like confessions.
You have that good- date glow.
translation.fr: On dirait que ça s'est bien passé.

translation.en: - He wants to go back out again. -
- Sorry for crashing. -
I was, uh, non- living vicariously through you.
translation.fr: Je vivais par procuration à travers toi.

translation.en: It's okay. Just… just do me a favor
translation.fr: C'est rien. Mais s'il te plaît, ne viens pas à nos autres rendez-vous.

translation.en: and maybe don't come on any of our other dates.
translation.fr: Mais s'il te plaît, ne viens pas à nos autres rendez-vous.

translation.en: No chaperone.
Got it.
- I'm glad it went well. - Oh, it really did.
We spent the entire night just talking.
translation.fr: Et on a passé la nuit à discuter.

translation.en: He's so interesting.
He knows all of these obscure bands.
translation.fr: Il connaît tous ces groupes inconnus.

translation.en: Plus, um, he even got me this blanket before I said I was cold.
translation.fr: Et il m'a apporté une couverture avant que je lui demande.

translation.en: Oh, and he smells really, really good.
- Like pine and pizza. -
translation.fr: Un mélange de pin et de pizza.

translation.en: - You're falling for him. - Yeah, I am.
Why are you crying?
These aren't sad tears.
translation.fr: - C'est pas des vraies larmes. - Mais si !

translation.en: - Yeah, but they're still tears. - This is your time. It's not about me.
translation.fr: - C'est pas des vraies larmes. - Mais si ! On parle de toi, pas de moi.

translation.en: It's just…
I guess it's starting to hit me that I'm never gonna have a first kiss again,
translation.fr: Je me rends compte que je n'aurai plus de premier baiser.

translation.en: or go on an amazing date, or go on a bad date.
translation.fr: Ni de super rencard ou de mauvais rencard.

translation.en: But worst of all,
I'm not gonna be here to watch all your career successes.
translation.fr: je ne serai pas là pour ta réussite professionnelle.

translation.en: I won't be here to watch you walk down the aisle and become a mother.
translation.fr: Je ne serai pas là quand tu te marieras et auras des enfants.

translation.en: And, oh, you're gonna be an amazing mom, Lis. Thanks.
translation.fr: - Tu seras une super maman. - Merci.

translation.en: Your kids are always gonna know they're loved.
translation.fr: Tes enfants sauront toujours qu'ils sont aimés.

translation.en: Plus, they're gonna…
…dominate the science fair.
- Oh, they will, won't they? - Yeah.
Sorry, maybe these are sad tears.
This isn't fair.
No one should have to die young.
I have to believe there's a reason for it.
translation.fr: Je dois croire qu'il y a une raison.

translation.en: Even if I don't know what it is yet.
- This is all my fault. - No!
translation.fr: - Tout est de ma faute. - Non !

translation.en: If I'd just stayed there with you that night, then none of this would've even happened.
translation.fr: Si j'étais restée avec toi, rien de tout ça ne serait arrivé.

translation.en: No. This was gonna happen no matter what you did. It was my time.
translation.fr: Ça n'aurait rien changé. C'était mon heure.

translation.en: When… when you were a kid, and your parents would fight,
translation.fr: Petite, quand tes parents se disputaient,

translation.en: I was the one who would distract you with a puzzle.
translation.fr: je te distrayais avec un puzzle.

translation.en: Yeah, and you had extra PJs for me whenever I didn't wanna go home.
translation.fr: Et tu avais un pyjama pour moi quand je ne voulais pas rentrer.

translation.en: - You've always been there for me. - But that night, I wasn't.
translation.fr: - Tu as toujours été là. - Pas ce soir-là.

translation.en: I mean, I heard you coming to my door, and I…
translation.fr: Je t'ai entendue à ma porte et je…

translation.en: I have been mad at myself ever since.
Don't be.
In a weird way, what happened is a good thing.
Now… now you get to live your own life and don't have to worry about taking care of me anymore.
translation.fr: Tu peux vivre ta propre vie. Tu n'as plus à t'occuper de moi.

translation.en: You don't mean that.
I can't lie. I'm almost an angel.
translation.fr: Je peux pas mentir. Je suis presque un ange.

translation.en: I'd like to be there for you one last time.
translation.fr: Je veux t'aider une dernière fois.

translation.en: I don't know why I'm supposed to care about her.
translation.fr: Pourquoi je dois me soucier d'elle ?

translation.en: She left me, you know?
But she's on my list, so…
translation.fr: Mais elle est sur ma liste.

translation.en: Well, hey, if you don't care, then why keep her postcards?
translation.fr: Si tu t'en fiches, pourquoi garder ses cartes ?

translation.en: How can I help you with your mom?
I can't believe she lives here.
This is exactly what she ran away from.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce qu'elle a fui.

translation.en: - Hi. - Hi. I was so glad you called.
Come in.
Thanks.
I, um, thought we could catch up on the patio.
I made lemonade. Would you like some? I have tea.
translation.fr: J'ai fait de la limonade. Sinon, j'ai du thé,

translation.en: I have one of those Jarritos. You used to love those.
translation.fr: ou ce soda mexicain que tu adorais.

translation.en: Um, I think water is fine. Thanks.
- How are you, Lisa? - Good.
- Still working at the museum? - Yeah.
Yeah, it's been busy, but it's been really good.
translation.fr: - Je travaille beaucoup mais ça va. - Bien.

translation.en: - Good. - How are you?
translation.fr: - Je travaille beaucoup mais ça va. - Bien. Et vous ?

translation.en: Busy. Busy with Morgan.
translation.fr: J'ai beaucoup à faire avec Morgan.

translation.en: - This is Morgan. - Oh, let me see.
- Oh, she's so cute! - She's like Cassie in a lot of ways.
translation.fr: - Trop mignonne ! - Elle ressemble à Cassie.

translation.en: Yeah, look, she's got that same mischievous grin.
translation.fr: Elle a le même sourire malicieux.

translation.en: They would've liked each other. I always wanted to introduce them,
but I wanted Cassie and I to be okay first.
translation.fr: mais je voulais d'abord me rabibocher avec Cassie.

translation.en: I'd like to get started.
So,
I found these in Cassie's box of keepsakes.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé ça dans la boîte à souvenirs de Cassie.

translation.en: She kept them?
It was my only way to know you. Tell her that, please.
translation.fr: C'était ma seule façon de te connaître. Dis-lui.

translation.en: Yeah. I think they made her feel closer to you.
translation.fr: Ça la rapprochait un peu de vous.

translation.en: I used to read her Mary Poppins.
She always wanted to see London. Did she ever go?
translation.fr: Elle rêvait de Londres. Elle y a été ?

translation.en: No, I didn't go anywhere. I was hoping you would come back to me.
translation.fr: Non, j'espérais que tu reviennes me chercher.

translation.en: No, she didn't.
Too bad. She would have loved it.
Mmm. Her first crush, actually, was this guy who moved here from England.
- Ian. - Ian.
It's one of the many things we have… had in common.
translation.fr: C'est… c'était l'un de nos nombreux points communs.

translation.en: I missed so much of her life.
It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.fr: Elle a dû avoir du mal à gérer sa vie amoureuse.

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.fr: Oui, mais ma mère était là pour répondre aux questions difficiles.

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
translation.fr: Je me doute que c'est dur de parler de ça, mais…

translation.en: Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
There's not one reason.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas une seule raison.

translation.en: What did I do to make you leave?
Was it something Cassie did?
No, never.
Cassie, she was an angel.
It was all me.
I was young.
And I thought I knew more than anyone around me. Sounds like Cassie.
translation.fr: - Je croyais savoir mieux que les autres. - Comme Cassie.

translation.en: I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.fr: J'avais une conception romantique de la vie de femme et de mère.

translation.en: But in reality,
I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.fr: je n'étais pas prête à assumer.

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.fr: Avec le recul, je vois à quel point Howie était patient et aimant.

translation.en: but at the time,
I found that suffocating.
I said the same thing.
For a while, Howie used to send me
pictures and letters,
telling me about her.
I never knew that.
But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.fr: Par honte, je ne répondais pas alors il a arrêté.

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.fr: Je me suis persuadée que les cartes postales étaient un bon substitut

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.fr: et qu'un jour, je pourrais tout expliquer et qu'on en rirait.

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
translation.fr: Ça semble ridicule quand je m'entends.

translation.en: I… I let her down.
The last time I saw her was college graduation, and we were like strangers.
translation.fr: Je l'avais vue à sa remise de diplôme. On était comme des inconnues.

translation.en: I remember.
Now it's too late to make it right.
And I'll never forgive myself for that.
translation.fr: Je ne me le pardonnerai jamais.

translation.en: Okay, I've heard enough.  I need to go.
translation.fr: J'en ai assez entendu. Je dois y aller.

translation.en: If Cassie was here right now,
what would you say to her?
What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
That I regret not taking her to London.
translation.fr: Que j'aurais dû l'emmener à Londres.

translation.en: I should have been there
to help her with her homework,
hold her when she had a nightmare.
I made a lot of selfish decisions.
translation.fr: J'ai pris beaucoup de décisions égoïstes.

translation.en: But one thing that never changed--
translation.fr: Mais une chose n'a jamais changé.

translation.en: One thing that never changed was my love for her.
translation.fr: Une chose n'a jamais changé, mon amour pour elle.

translation.en: If Cassie were here…
I would tell her that the day she was born
translation.fr: je lui dirais que le jour de sa naissance

translation.en: was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.fr: était l'un des plus beaux moments de ma vie.

translation.en: And running away,
it was my worst.
I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
translation.fr: J'espère qu'elle sait à quel point je suis désolée.

translation.en: She does.
She knows.
Are you okay?
How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
translation.fr: Comment finir s'il manque des pièces ?

translation.en: God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.fr: C'est frustrant ! Pourquoi tu as choisi ce puzzle ?

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre de vouloir parler du puzzle ?

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.fr: Tu sais à quel point c'était dur de rien pouvoir dire ?

translation.en: I really don't.
I have years of questions.
Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.fr: Mais là, à côté d'elle, j'avais juste envie de crier ou de fuir.

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter. Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
translation.fr: - Telle mère, telle fille. - Mais tu ne l'as pas fait et c'est bien.

translation.en: Would you have translated if I did?
translation.fr: Tu lui aurais dit si j'étais partie ?

translation.en: It upset me that you took the conversation over.
No, no. I didn't take anything over.
I could tell that she needed to talk to you,
translation.fr: J'ai senti qu'elle avait besoin de te parler

translation.en: and you needed to hear what she had to say.
That was for me to decide!
- I'm on your side, Cassie. - Ugh.
translation.fr: Je suis de ton côté, Cassie.

translation.en: I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.fr: Elle avait besoin de parler. Tu avais besoin de l'écouter !

translation.en: You don't get it!
How could you? You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.fr: Tu as une vie et un avenir parfaits. Moi, j'ai rien de tout ça.

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.fr: Tu es en colère contre ta mère. C'est compréhensible, mais…

translation.en: You know what? It's…
It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
translation.fr: Ne me rejette pas la faute.

translation.en: Sorry. Does my messy non- life make you uncomfortable?
translation.fr: Ma non-vie te met mal à l'aise ?

translation.en: Here we go again. Classic.
I died before I ever got a chance to live!
translation.fr: Je suis morte avant d'avoir pu vivre !

translation.en: Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je souffre ! Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: God, after our fight,
after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.fr: après ta mort, j'étais rongée par la culpabilité.

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.fr: J'ai dû me relever, réorganiser ma vie sans toi.

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.fr: Beau boulot. Y a pas une trace de mon passage.

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
translation.fr: J'ai été réduite à une boîte de bibelots.

translation.en: After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.fr: Après tout ça, je peux pas croire qu'on se dispute.

translation.en: Well, I'm dead,
so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.fr: tu te disputeras plus jamais avec moi.

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.fr: J'ai vu ma mère. J'ai trouvé un copain à Lisa.

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé à mon père qui ne m'entend pas.

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
translation.fr: Ça suffit pas ? Je dois y retourner ?

translation.en: Well, not if you don't want to.
Thank you.
Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, je vais t'accompagner à l'ascenseur.

translation.en: When you get there, hit B for Below.
translation.fr: Devant, presse le bouton pour descendre.

translation.en: - Very funny. I get it. - No, you don't.
Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.fr: Pourquoi risquer de gâcher tout ce que tu as fait ?

translation.en: And over an argument?
You were doing so well.
- You think I'm doing well? - Yes, I do. Don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.fr: J'espérais ne pas avoir à te dire ça, mais tant pis.

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.fr: Si tu veux vraiment arrêter, c'est possible.

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.fr: Mais sache que si tu laisses ta liste inachevée,

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.fr: tout le bien que tu as fait sera annulé.

translation.en: Everything?
Lisa?
My dad?
Everything.
Oh, that's… that's terrible.
I can't… I can't do that to them.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas leur faire ça.

translation.en: - - So, you've made your decision?
translation.fr: Alors, tu as pris ta décision ?

translation.en: Dad, I really need to talk--
- What is she doing here? - More tea?
Please.
I still can't believe you left your accounting practice to open a yoga studio.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à croire que tu aies ouvert un studio de yoga.

translation.en: You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.fr: Tu en parlais, mais je ne pensais pas que tu le ferais.

translation.en: I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.fr: Je disais aussi que je deviendrais batteur.

translation.en: - I remember that one. - This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.fr: Je m'en souviens. J'ai fait le bon choix.

translation.en: It suits you.
You might not have said that a few days ago.
translation.fr: Tu n'aurais pas dit ça il y a quelques jours.

translation.en: This past year has been a challenge.
You know, Lisa visited me today.
translation.fr: Lisa est venue me voir aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I know this may sound nutty.
During that visit, it…
it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.fr: j'ai eu la sensation que Cassie se tenait à mes côtés.

translation.en: I know what you mean.
She was a lot like you though.
Fearless, independent.
She'd dive headfirst into…  …any situation.
translation.fr: Elle fonçait tête baissée dans toutes les situations.

translation.en: But more than anything, she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.fr: Mais surtout, c'était une boule d'énergie qui irradiait partout où elle allait.

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
translation.fr: j'ai ressenti le besoin de te voir.

translation.en: I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu saches à quel point je suis désolée d'être partie.

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas la vie que j'avais imaginée.

translation.en: Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.fr: Ton départ m'a forcé à devenir meilleur, un meilleur parent.

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.fr: J'espère que d'une certaine façon, j'ai pu panser ses blessures.

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
Look, I've kept you long enough.
Thanks for this.
You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air or this dandelion tea talking,
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si je dis ça à cause du palo santo ou de ce thé,

translation.en: but I feel as though Cassie, wherever she is--
translation.fr: mais je crois que Cassie, où qu'elle soit…

translation.en: Brought us back together.
Mom, wait!
I forgive you.
So proud of you.
translation.fr: Je suis si fière de toi.

translation.en: That felt good. I can tell. I mean, you seem lighter.
translation.fr: - Ça m'a fait du bien. - Ça se voit. Tu as l'air plus légère.

translation.en: Hey, so, um…
I need a favor. It's for a good cause, I swear!
translation.fr: J'ai une requête. Une bonne cause, je le jure.

translation.en: No swearing.
I didn't actually swear!
There's this bakery, and the owner seems like a really thoughtful person.
translation.fr: Il y a une pâtissière qui a l'air très attentionnée.

translation.en: I know she's not on my list, but I think I can help her and help my dad.
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas sur ma liste, mais je peux l'aider et mon père avec.

translation.en: We're not running a matchmaking service here.
I know, but they could both use a kind person in their life.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais ils le méritent tous les deux.

translation.en: This could also be a thank- you to Emme for being such a good friend to Lisa since I've been gone.
translation.fr: Et c'est un moyen de remercier Emme d'avoir été là pour Lisa.

translation.en: I've never had anyone want to add to their list before.
translation.fr: Personne ne m'a jamais demandé d'ajouter un nom.

translation.en: I've also never had anyone like you before.
translation.fr: Mais tu es unique en ton genre.

translation.en: I'll allow it.
- Thank you! - Oh!
You're the best! Thank you! Thank you!
Yeah, but you're still on the same timeline.
translation.fr: Mais ton échéance ne change pas.

translation.en: Tomorrow is your last day, Cassie.
I got this.
Perfect.
I can't leave it like this. It's a bakery, not Grandma's basement.
translation.fr: Je dois faire quelque chose. On n'est pas chez mamie ici.

translation.en: Are you behind this too, Cassie?
I like your faith in me, Dad.
translation.fr: Merci de croire en moi, papa.

translation.en: Morgan, mijita, are you dressed?
We're leaving in five minutes.
We don't wanna be late again.
Would you like some tea?
You can see me?
I saw you at the park too.
translation.fr: Je t'ai vue au parc aussi.

translation.en: Aren't you scared?
You're my guardian angel.
Ask your mom to read this to you.
translation.fr: Demande à ta mère de te lire ça.

translation.en: I will.
This is our secret, okay?
Dr. Redding.
I wish Cassie was here.
I'm right here.
I do have a piece of you.
translation.fr: J'ai gardé un petit morceau de toi.

translation.en: - It's from our very first puzzle. - Yeah.
It's, uh, it's kinda like my lucky charm.
I thought you were done with me.
translation.fr: Tu ne voulais plus me voir.

translation.en: There are no grudges in the afterlife.
translation.fr: Pas de place pour la rancœur là-haut.

translation.en: Are there any here?
No. No, no. I do not wanna lose any more time with you.
translation.fr: Non. Je ne veux plus gâcher le temps qui me reste avec toi.

translation.en: - Neither do I. - No, no, no!
- I don't think I can explain an air hug. - Good point.
translation.fr: - Je peux pas expliquer un câlin. - Bien vu.

translation.en: Okay, so what's the problem? Why are you hesitating? This is yours to lose.
translation.fr: Quel est le problème ? Pourquoi tu hésites ? T'as tout à gagner.

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
Cassie, what if I don't get it? What then?
translation.fr: Et si je n'ai pas le poste ?

translation.en: You'll survive, and you'll go on to something even better.
translation.fr: Tu survivras et tu trouveras mieux.

translation.en: No. No.
Look at me. Do you want this?
- Yeah. - Are you the best person for this job?
translation.fr: - Oui. - Tu es la plus qualifiée ?

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm not buying that yeah. You gotta try again. Are you the best person for this?
translation.fr: Pas convaincant. Recommence. Tu es la plus qualifiée ?

translation.en: Yeah! I am the best person for this!
translation.fr: Oui ! Je suis la plus qualifiée !

translation.en: Yes! There's my strong friend! Life is too short to be fearful.
translation.fr: Voilà ! La vie est trop courte pour avoir peur.

translation.en: Yeah, Cassie, I eat, I sleep, I drink this job.
translation.fr: Je me suis démenée pour ce boulot.

translation.en: If I got this job, I'd crush it so hard, they'd name a freaking fossil after me.
translation.fr: Je vais tellement assurer qu'ils donneront mon nom à un fossile.

translation.en: - I would-- - Use that energy and go sign up!
translation.fr: - Utilise cette énergie pour postuler ! - Je postule d'abord.

translation.en: Right! Sign up first. Dominate second.
translation.fr: - Utilise cette énergie pour postuler ! - Je postule d'abord. Ensuite, je domine.

translation.en: Oh, I've created a monster.
I love it.
Phew. Bam, bam. Good luck.
Hi.
I've heard nice things about you, Lisa.
translation.fr: J'ai entendu de bonnes choses sur vous.

translation.en: - Thanks. - I'm glad you decided to interview. And last too.
translation.fr: Je suis contente que vous ayez postulé. En dernière !

translation.en: That's a bold move.
Shows the competition you're not worried about who came before.
translation.fr: Vous montrez aux autres qu'ils ne vous font pas peur.

translation.en: Oh, um, I didn't plan that--
Modesty's a myth that was sold to women a long time ago.
translation.fr: La modestie est un mythe qu'on a vendu aux femmes.

translation.en: Be proud of your work.
Why paleontology?
I love digging in dirt,
and I hated when people told me that it wasn't a proper career for a lady.
translation.fr: et je détestais qu'on me rabâche que ce n'était pas un boulot de femme.

translation.en: But, uh, mostly, I found it comforting studying what is real.
translation.fr: Mais surtout, je trouvais réconfortant d'étudier quelque chose de réel.

translation.en: With fossils, it's like this tangible connection to the past, you know?
translation.fr: Les fossiles créent un lien tangible avec le passé.

translation.en: But, uh, now I've…
I've started learning from what I…
I can't see.
translation.fr: de ce que je ne vois pas.

translation.en: - Bye. - Bye.
- Bye. - See you.
Cassie?
- I got it! I got it! -
- I got the job! I got it! - You got it!
Thank you so much for the push. I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.fr: Merci. Je n'y serais jamais arrivée sans toi.
